docs.lead_paragraph: Zenefits’ announcement of serious errors underscores how huge funding rounds and overinflated expectations may wreak havoc in Silicon Valley.

headline.main: Zenefits Scandal Highlights Perils of Hypergrowth at Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Scandal Highlights Perils of Inflated Expectations

docs.abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column notes that highly funded human-resources start-up Zenefits announced number of errors and investigations that will probably end up being defining scandal of most recent tech boom; says it is cautionary lesson in dangers of expanding too rapidly.
docs.snippet: Zenefits’ announcement of serious errors underscores how huge funding rounds and overinflated expectations may wreak havoc in Silicon Valley.

docs.lead_paragraph: Panasonic Corp. said Thursday it will recognize same-sex marriages in its employment policies in a rare move for a major Japanese manufacturer.

headline.main: Panasonic Decides to Recognize Employee's Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: Panasonic Decides to Recognize Employee's Same-Sex Marriages

docs.snippet: Panasonic Corp. said Thursday it will recognize same-sex marriages in its employment policies in a rare move for a major Japanese manufacturer.

docs.lead_paragraph: The government, doctors' groups, insurers and patient advocates say they're coming together on a common set of measurements for what constitutes quality health care.

headline.main: A Step Forward for Measuring Health Care Quality
headline.print_headline: A Step Forward for Measuring Health Care Quality

docs.snippet: The government, doctors' groups, insurers and patient advocates say they're coming together on a common set of measurements for what constitutes quality health care.

headline.main: Transgender Patients Face Challenges at the Hospital

docs.abstract: From medical issues to roommates, transgender patients face barriers to good health care. Some institutions are trying to change that.
docs.snippet: From medical issues to roommates, transgender patients face barriers to good health care. Some institutions are trying to change that.

docs.lead_paragraph: BGEO Group Plc, the holding company for JSC Bank of Georgia, reported a 29 percent rise in full-year profit, helped by robust income in its banking and healthcare businesses, beating sluggish economic growth in the country.

headline.main: BGEO Group Profit Boosted by Banking, Healthcare Businesses
headline.print_headline: BGEO Group Profit Boosted by Banking, Healthcare Businesses

docs.snippet: BGEO Group Plc, the holding company for JSC Bank of Georgia, reported a 29 percent rise in full-year profit, helped by robust income in its banking and healthcare businesses, beating sluggish economic growth in the country.

docs.lead_paragraph: The insurance can be complicated and something few like to think about, but buying a simple 20-year term policy is a plan that many can live with.
docs.snippet: The insurance can be complicated and something few like to think about, but buying a simple 20-year term policy is a plan that many can live with.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some who share the candidate’s goals suggest that his proposals, especially on health care, could increase the federal government’s size by over 50 percent.

headline.main: Left-Leaning Economists Question Cost of Bernie Sanders’s Plans

docs.abstract: Liberal-leaning economists scrutinize validity of economic proposals by presidential candidate Sen Bernie Sanders, focusing specifically on his health care plan; estimate that his agenda would increase size of federal government by over 50 percent if implemented.
docs.snippet: Some who share the candidate’s goals suggest that his proposals, especially on health care, could increase the federal government’s size by over 50 percent.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Some patients avoid this specialty, which provides relief from pain and discomfort, because they mistake it for end-of-life care.

headline.main: In Palliative Care, Comfort Is the Top Priority

docs.abstract: Paula Span The New Old Age column examines resistance by many patients and their families to receiving palliative care because of its association with hospice care and eventuality of death; service, however, provides both pain relief and emotional and spiritual support, focuses on quality of life, and is often available in outpatient clinics.
docs.snippet: Some patients avoid this specialty, which provides relief from pain and discomfort, because they mistake it for end-of-life care.

docs.lead_paragraph: As his rivals focused on South Carolina's looming primary, Republican presidential candidate John Kasich campaigned across Michigan on Monday, plugging his blue-collar roots and warning college students that the U.S. is "not a socialist country."

headline.main: Kasich Campaigns in Michigan, While Rivals Fight in South
headline.print_headline: Kasich Campaigns in Michigan, While Rivals Fight in South

docs.snippet: As his rivals focused on South Carolina's looming primary, Republican presidential candidate John Kasich campaigned across Michigan on Monday, plugging his blue-collar roots and warning college students that the U.S. is "not a socialist country."
